metadata.description: The prequel to the best-selling graphic novel of all time! Discover what happened before WATCHMEN. Award-winning creators and top talents-including Darwyn Cooke, Adam Hughes, J. Michael Straczynski, Brian Azzarello, Lee Bermejo, Len Wein, Joe Kubert, and more-bring you tales of the heroes and villains of WATCHMEN prior to the events of the graphic novel.
metadata.name: Before Watchmen
